title: News: Acts added to the Visions 2014 lineup
body:
The second wave of acts for Visions Festival 2014 was announced yesterday seeing [Perfume Genius](https://www.

facebook.com/perfumegeniusofficial), [Uncle Acid and the deadbeats](https://www.facebook.com/uncleacid), [Deptford Goth](https://www.facebook.com/deptfordgoth), [Trust](https://www.facebook.com/dressedforspace), Lower, [Eleanor Friedberger](https://www.facebook.com/eleanor.friedberger.official), [Eyedress](https://www.facebook.com/eyedress), [Ｙｕｍｉ Ｚｏｕｍａ](https://www.facebook.com/YumiZouma), and [Kiran Leonard](https://www.facebook.com/digitalsustain) added to the roster. They join [Polica](https://www.facebook.com/thisispolica), [Andrew W.K.](https://www.facebook.com/andrewwk) (YES ANDREW FUCKING W.K), [Baths](https://www.facebook.com/bathsmusic), The Range, [Fat Whites](https://www.facebook.com/FatWhiteFamily), [Eagulls](https://www.facebook.com/eagulls), [Young Fathers](https://www.facebook.com/youngfathers), [Perfect Pussy](https://www.facebook.com/prrfectpssy), [Jacco Gardner](https://www.facebook.com/jaccogardnermusic), [ÅRABROT](https://www.facebook.com/arabrotnoise),[Sean Nicholas Savage](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Sean-Nicholas-Savage/193104860732288), [Josef Salvat](https://www.facebook.com/JosefSalvatMusic) and [Rainer](https://www.facebook.com/Rainer.official). The one day festival taking place in [four venues](http://visionsfestival.com/venues "Visions Venues 2014 ") across London Fields promises to be a blinder. You can read about last year’s escapades [here](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/23779-live-review-visions-festival-2013/).

excerpt.full: The second wave of acts for Visions Festival 2014 was announced yesterday seeing Perfume Genius, Uncle Acid and the deadbeats, Deptford Goth, Trust, Lower, Eleanor Friedberger, Eyedress, Ｙｕｍｉ Ｚｏｕｍａ, and Kiran Leonard added to the roster. They join Polica, Andrew W.K. (YES ANDREW FUCKING W.K), Baths, The Range, Fat Whites, Eagulls, Young Fathers, Perfect Pussy, Jacco Gardner, ÅRABROT,Sean Nicholas Savage, Josef Salvat and Rainer. The one day festival taking place in four venues across London Fields promises \[…\]
